00028 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #ifndef __HT32F5XXXX_RTC_H
00030 #define __HT32F5XXXX_RTC_H
00031 
00032 #ifdef __cplusplus
00033  extern "C" {
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00037 #include "ht32.h"
00038 
00039 /** @addtogroup HT32F5xxxx_Peripheral_Driver HT32F5xxxx Peripheral Driver
00040   * @{
00041   */
00042 
00043 /** @addtogroup RTC
00044   * @{
00045   */
00046 
00047 
00048 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /** @defgroup RTC_Exported_Types RTC exported types
00050   * @{
00051   */
00052 
00053 /**
00054  * @brief Selection of RTC clock source
00055  */
00056 typedef enum
00057 {
00058   RTC_SRC_LSI = 0,                /*!< Low speed internal clock, about 32 kHz                               */
00059   #if (LIBCFG_LSE)
00060   RTC_SRC_LSE                     /*!< Low speed external 32768 Hz clock                                    */
00061   #endif
00062 } RTC_SRC_Enum;
00063 /**
00064  * @brief Selection of RTC LSE startup mode
00065  */
00066 typedef enum
00067 {
00068   RTC_LSESM_NORMAL = 0,       /*!< Little power consumption but longer startup time.                        */
00069   RTC_LSESM_FAST              /*!< Shortly startup time but higher power consumption.                       */
00070 } RTC_LSESM_Enum;
00071 /**
00072  * @brief Selection of RTC prescaler
00073  */
00074 typedef enum
00075 {
00076   RTC_RPRE_1     = 0x0000,           /*!< CK_SECOND = CK_RTC                                                */
00077   RTC_RPRE_2     = 0x0100,           /*!< CK_SECOND = CK_RTC / 2                                            */
00078   RTC_RPRE_4     = 0x0200,           /*!< CK_SECOND = CK_RTC / 4                                            */
00079   RTC_RPRE_8     = 0x0300,           /*!< CK_SECOND = CK_RTC / 8                                            */
00080   RTC_RPRE_16    = 0x0400,           /*!< CK_SECOND = CK_RTC / 16                                           */
00081   RTC_RPRE_32    = 0x0500,           /*!< CK_SECOND = CK_RTC / 32                                           */
00082   RTC_RPRE_64    = 0x0600,           /*!< CK_SECOND = CK_RTC / 64                                           */
00083   RTC_RPRE_128   = 0x0700,           /*!< CK_SECOND = CK_RTC / 128                                          */
00084   RTC_RPRE_256   = 0x0800,           /*!< CK_SECOND = CK_RTC / 256                                          */
00085   RTC_RPRE_512   = 0x0900,           /*!< CK_SECOND = CK_RTC / 512                                          */
00086   RTC_RPRE_1024  = 0x0A00,           /*!< CK_SECOND = CK_RTC / 1024                                         */
00087   RTC_RPRE_2048  = 0x0B00,           /*!< CK_SECOND = CK_RTC / 2048                                         */
00088   RTC_RPRE_4096  = 0x0C00,           /*!< CK_SECOND = CK_RTC / 4096                                         */
00089   RTC_RPRE_8192  = 0x0D00,           /*!< CK_SECOND = CK_RTC / 8192                                         */
00090   RTC_RPRE_16384 = 0x0E00,           /*!< CK_SECOND = CK_RTC / 16384                                        */
00091   RTC_RPRE_32768 = 0x0F00            /*!< CK_SECOND = CK_RTC / 32768                                        */
00092 } RTC_RPRE_Enum;
00093 /**
00094  * @brief Active polarity of RTC output
00095  */
00096 typedef enum
00097 {
00098   RTC_ROAP_HIGH = 0,              /*!< Active level is high                                                 */
00099   RTC_ROAP_LOW                    /*!< Active level is low                                                  */
00100 } RTC_ROAP_Enum;
00101 /**
00102  * @brief Waveform mode of RTC output
00103  */
00104 typedef enum
00105 {
00106   RTC_ROWM_PULSE = 0,              /*!< Pulse mode.                                                         */
00107   RTC_ROWM_LEVEL                   /*!< Level mode.                                                         */
00108 } RTC_ROWM_Enum;
00109 /**
00110  * @brief Waveform mode of RTC output
00111  */
00112 typedef enum
00113 {
00114   RTC_ROES_MATCH = 0,              /*!< Selected RTC compare match.                                         */
00115   RTC_ROES_SECOND                  /*!< Selected RTC second clock.                                          */
00116 } RTC_ROES_Enum;
00117 /**
00118   * @}
00119   */
00120 
00121 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00122 /** @defgroup RTC_Exported_Constants RTC exported constants
00123   * @{
00124   */
00125 
00126 /** @defgroup RTC_WAKEUP  Selection of RTC wakeup source
00127   * @{
00128   */
00129 #define RTC_WAKEUP_CSEC   0x00000100
00130 #define RTC_WAKEUP_CM     0x00000200
00131 #define RTC_WAKEUP_OV     0x00000400
00132 /**
00133   * @}
00134   */
00135 
00136 /** @defgroup RTC_IT RTC Selection of interrupt source
00137   * @{
00138   */
00139 #define RTC_INT_CSEC      0x00000001
00140 #define RTC_INT_CM        0x00000002
00141 #define RTC_INT_OV        0x00000004
00142 /**
00143   * @}
00144   */
00145 
00146 /** @defgroup RTC_FLAG RTC Definitions of flags
00147   * @{
00148   */
00149 #define RTC_FLAG_CSEC     0x00000001
00150 #define RTC_FLAG_CM       0x00000002
00151 #define RTC_FLAG_OV       0x00000004
00152 /**
00153   * @}
00154   */
00155 
00156 /** @defgroup RTC_Check_Parameter Selection of Vdd18 power good
00157   * @{
00158   */
00159 
00160 /**
00161  * @brief Used to check RTC_SRC_Enum parameter
00162  */
00163 #if (LIBCFG_LSE)
00164 #define IS_RTC_SRC_LSE(x)  (x == RTC_SRC_LSE) 
00165 #else
00166 #define IS_RTC_SRC_LSE(x)  (0)
00167 #endif
00168 #define IS_RTC_SRC(x) ((x == RTC_SRC_LSI) || IS_RTC_SRC_LSE(x))
00169 /**
00170  * @brief Used to check RTC_LSESM_Enum parameter
00171  */
00172 #define IS_RTC_LSESM(x) ((x == RTC_LSESM_NORMAL) || (x == RTC_LSESM_FAST))
00173 /**
00174  * @brief Used to check RTC_RPRE_Enum parameter
00175  */
00176 #define IS_RTC_PSC(x) ((x == RTC_RPRE_1) || (x == RTC_RPRE_2) || (x == RTC_RPRE_4) ||\
00177                        (x == RTC_RPRE_8) || (x == RTC_RPRE_16) || (x == RTC_RPRE_32) ||\
00178                        (x == RTC_RPRE_64) || (x == RTC_RPRE_128) || (x == RTC_RPRE_256) ||\
00179                        (x == RTC_RPRE_512) || (x == RTC_RPRE_1024) || (x == RTC_RPRE_2048) ||\
00180                        (x == RTC_RPRE_4096) || (x == RTC_RPRE_8192) || (x == RTC_RPRE_16384) ||\
00181                        (x == RTC_RPRE_32768))
00182 /**
00183  * @brief Used to check RTC_ROAP_Enum parameter
00184  */
00185 #define IS_RTC_ROAP(x) ((x == RTC_ROAP_HIGH) || (x == RTC_ROAP_LOW))
00186 /**
00187  * @brief Used to check RTC_ROWM_Enum parameter
00188  */
00189 #define IS_RTC_ROWM(x) ((x == RTC_ROWM_PULSE) || (x == RTC_ROWM_LEVEL))
00190 /**
00191  * @brief Used to check RTC_ROES_Enum parameter
00192  */
00193 #define IS_RTC_ROES(x) ((x == RTC_ROES_MATCH) || (x == RTC_ROES_SECOND))
00194 /**
00195  * @brief Used to check RTC_WAKEUP parameter
00196  */
00197 #define IS_RTC_WAKEUP(x) ((((x) & (u32)0xFFFFF8FF) == 0x00) && ((x) != 0x00))
00198 /**
00199  * @brief Used to check RTC_INT parameter
00200  */
00201 #define IS_RTC_INT(x) ((((x) & (u32)0xFFFFFFF8) == 0x00) && ((x) != 0x00))
00202 /**
00203  * @brief Used to check RTC_FLAG parameter
00204  */
00205 #define IS_RTC_FLAG(x) ((((x) & (u32)0xFFFFFFF8) == 0x00) && ((x) != 0x00))
00206 /**
00207   * @}
00208   */
00209 
00210 /**
00211   * @}
00212   */
00213

00215 /** @defgroup RTC_Exported_Functions RTC exported functions
00216   * @{
00217   */
00218 void RTC_DeInit(void);
00219 void RTC_ClockSourceConfig(RTC_SRC_Enum Source);
00220 #if (LIBCFG_RTC_LSI_LOAD_TRIM)
00221 void RTC_LSILoadTrimData(void);
00222 #endif
00223 void RTC_LSESMConfig(RTC_LSESM_Enum Mode);
00224 void RTC_LSECmd(ControlStatus NewState);
00225 void RTC_CMPCLRCmd(ControlStatus NewState);
00226 void RTC_SetPrescaler(RTC_RPRE_Enum Psc);
00227 u16 RTC_GetPrescaler(void);
00228 void RTC_Cmd(ControlStatus NewState);
00229 u32 RTC_GetCounter(void);
00230 void RTC_SetCompare(u32 Compare);
00231 u32 RTC_GetCompare(void);
00232 void RTC_WakeupConfig(u32 RTC_WAKEUP, ControlStatus NewState);
00233 void RTC_IntConfig(u32 RTC_INT, ControlStatus NewState);
00234 u8 RTC_GetFlagStatus(void);
00235 void RTC_OutConfig(RTC_ROWM_Enum WMode, RTC_ROES_Enum EventSel, RTC_ROAP_Enum Pol);
00236 void RTC_OutCmd(ControlStatus NewState);
00237 FlagStatus RTC_GetOutStatus(void);
